item.description:
What's better than "I had a great time and made new friends." -Ariel S

How about adding: Doing good to that? :)

 

Don't miss our special fundraiser where we partner with the Boston Volunteers on March 7 at Orleans bar in Davis Square at 7pm. It will be a fun night of painting and drinking. No experience necessary. A local artist will walk you step-by-step through a painting while you sip cocktails from the bar. All painting supplies will be provided by Paint Nite. Please note: alcohol is not part of the ticket price. You will buy spirits from the bar as you normally would. Tickets are $45 per person.

 

Sign up today because there are very few spots left. It's great for you to bring your friends or for a special date night. It will fill up fast.

 

Afterwards we'll sip some refreshing spirits, chat, enjoy each others art, make interesting new friends and connect.

 

Because you are supporting the Boston Volunteers, we are allowing 15% off for those that sign up prior to February 28. At checkout on the Paint Nite website use the coupon code BosVol15 for 15% off your ticket price.

Learn more: http://paintnite.com/boston/event/815

 

Our earnings will provide future volunteer opportunities including our popular pet charity event.

I'll provide the results for you during the event. :)

 

This is an Meetup exclusive event to benefit the Boston Volunteers.

It's a very popular event.

 

There are only a couple of tickets left.

Don't miss this community building adventure! :)
Josh

 

P.S. Learn more: http://paintnite.com/boston/event/815

 

P.P.S. Learn more about your Boston Volunteers
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be the popular group standing next to the door. I'll provide my cell for your convenience. :)
item.name: Paint and Cocktail night?
